sentences.en: Heighten efficiency ; predigest working procedure to reduce cost.
sentences.cn: 在工作范围内,不断提高效率、简化工作以降低成本.

sentences.en: So we adopted predigest heat way in calculating temperature ascend of submersible electric motor.
sentences.cn: 本文采用简化热路法计算潜水电机的温升.

sentences.en: The flexibility in software designing is utilized to predigest the design of hardware circuits.
sentences.cn: 在软件设计过程中,利用软件设计的灵活性来简化硬件电路的设计.

sentences.en: Therefore , it is essential to study how to predigest actual circuit and achieve optimized design in V HDL .
sentences.cn: 因此，有必要深入讨论在V HDL 设计、应用中如何简化实际电路，达到优化设计的要求。

trans.tran_en: to treat (food) artificially to aid subsequent digestion in the body
